name: workoutlog_server
description: We'd like you to get some practice and have another look at building a server. In order to review what we have studied in the previous modules, we'd like you to create a new Express Server. In your folder, make a folder called . Inside this folder, you will create the new server. Please refer to the Node Server - Server Setup module for a refresher on how to set up a server.
author: Amy Melangton
